content: 형변환 확장 함수 public static class ExtensionMethods { public static int ToInt(this string value, int defaultInteger = 0) { try { if (int.TryParse(value, out int validInteger)) return validInteger; else return defaultInteger; } catch { return defaultInteger; } } public static decimal ToDecimal(this string value, decimal defaultDecimal = 0.0M) { try { if (decimal.TryParse(value, out decimal validDecimal)) return validDecimal; else return defaultDecimal; } catch { return defaultDecimal; } } public static double ToDouble(this string value, double defaultDouble = 0.0D) { try { if (double.TryParse(value, out double validDouble)) // Out variables return validDouble; else return defaultDouble; } catch { return defaultDouble; } } }
title: Csharp Default Extension Function
